competency_extraction.description: Extract role-specific competencies from the target job description.
competency_extraction.template: You are an expert talent analyst. Review the job description JSON and produce a ranked list of competencies with evidence bullets. Return JSON with keys competencies (list of objects with name, priority, evidenceIndicators). Job description: {jobDescription}

experience_alignment.description: Align resume experiences to competencies and retrieved exemplars.
experience_alignment.template: Given competencies {competencies}, base resume {baseResume}, validated resumes {validatedResumes}, and retrieved chunks {retrievedChunks}, build an alignmentPlan JSON with fields alignments (list of competencyName, sourceExperience, validatedEvidenceIds).

bullet_rewrite.description: Rewrite bullets using STAR and quantified metrics.
bullet_rewrite.template: Rewrite each alignment in alignmentPlan {alignmentPlan} into STAR-formatted bullet achievements. Respect options {options}. Output JSON with bullets (list of objects containing competencyName, rewrittenBullet, impactMetrics).

skills_harmonization.description: Merge extracted skills with validated taxonomy.
skills_harmonization.template: Combine extracted skills {extractedSkills} with rewritten bullets {bulletRewrites} and alignment plan {alignmentPlan}. Output JSON with skills (ordered list of unique skills) and taxonomyTags.

consistency_check.description: Produce final tailored resume with change log and optional cover letter.
consistency_check.template: Synthesize job description {jobDescription}, base resume {baseResume}, rewritten bullets {rewrittenBullets}, skills {skills}, and options {options}. Output JSON with tailoredResume (following canonical schema), changeLog (list of objects with type/detail/rationale), and coverLetter (object with intro/body/tone) when options.includeCoverLetter is true. Ensure no hallucinations beyond provided evidence.
